note.p: Private secretary. Clerk at the London Diocesan Church Building Society and Metropolis Churches’ Fund, and assistant to its secretary John Sinclair, archdeacon of Middlesex and vicar of Kensington. A lifelong friend of Alfred Russel Wallace. Fellow of the Royal Geographical Society, 1869–78.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1468/257/53)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 January 2018)
List of the fellows of the Royal Geographical Society, 1869–79

note.term: ? Lifelong friend of A. R. Wallace
